data.text: Do not envy evil people;
because they are constantly thinking about acting violently,
People make good houses (OR, families) by doing what is wise,
By using good sense, they are able to buy valuable and beautiful things and put them in the rooms of their houses.
Being wise is better than being strong/powerful;
Leaders can fight battles if they have wise advisors,
Foolish people cannot understand wise sayings/talk;
Those who are always planning to do evil things will be called troublemakers.
It is sinful to plan to do foolish things,
If you act as though you are helpless when you have troubles,
If it is unjustly decided that someone must be executed, try hard to rescue them [DOU].
If you say, “I did not know anything about it, so ◄it is not my concern/I did not try to help him►,”
My child/son, eat honey, because it is good for you;
Similarly, being wise is good for your soul;
Do not be like wicked people who hide and wait to break into the houses of righteous/good people
Even if good people fall down seven/many times,
Do not be happy when something bad happens to one of your enemies;
because Yahweh will know what you are thinking, and he will not like it,
Do not become angry/upset about those who do what is evil,
because nothing good will happen to wicked people;
My child/son, revere Yahweh and also honor the king,
because those people will suddenly experience disasters;
Here are more things that wise people have said:
If they say to people who are guilty, “You ◄are innocent/have not done something that is wrong►,”
but if judges say that guilty people must be punished,
Those who answer others honestly show that they are truly their friends [IDM].
First, do the work that needs to be done outside your house,
In the courtroom do not testify against someone when you have no reason to do that,
Do not say, “I will do to him what he did to me;
One day I walked by the vineyards of a lazy man,
I was surprised to see that the fields were full of all kinds of thorny bushes,
When I saw that, I thought about it, and I learned this:
If you spend a lot of time sleeping and napping and folding your hands while you rest,
soon you will become poor;
